author: asianlego
title: Fiery Dragster
review: The front wheels are very slim compared to the rear ones and it looks out of place. Minutes after assembling it, I tore down the whole thing apart and built another vehicle out of it with other wheels.

author: gome4
title: fun... for a while
review:
this is fun to play with for 2 days, then you get bored of it, so i made it into the combo model. but here is the review of this

pros
fun for 2 days
pull back motors
easy to build

cons
no mini figure
the front wheels look out of place
